shows.title: Russell Brand in conversation
shows.desc:
When Russell announced on Twitter that he'd be at Greenbelt, he said it was to talk about "life, death, consciousness, dimensions; y’know the usual." Wow! Throw in belief and religion too and we've got ourselves a corker of a conversation with one of the wittiest and wisest people on the planet. It's time for us to get 'under the skin' of one of our most intriguing cultural figures.

From Hollywood fame, A-list celebrity and bad-boy-addict-notoriety to a spiritual seeker, thinker, writer, podcaster and recovery mentor, Russell's is a truly fascinating journey. And we want to get into it with him.

Russell will be in conversation with Greenbelt's Creative Director, Paul Northup
